basics.name: Nazar Palamarchuk
basics.label: Full Stack Web & Mobile Developer with AI Expertise
basics.summary: Full‑stack SaaS experience — from MVP to production deployment. TypeScript‑first approach — designing type‑safe architectures across all projects. AI‑powered feature integration in mobile and web apps. Global engineering experience working with international teams at Boeing.
coreHighlights: Full‑stack SaaS experience — from MVP to production deployment.
TypeScript‑first approach — designing type‑safe architectures across all projects.
AI‑powered feature integration in mobile and web apps.
Global engineering experience working with international teams at Boeing.

work.name: Breadly
work.summary: SaaS mobile app for tracking budgets and expenses with a unique AI‑powered receipt scanning and voice expense entry system. Automatically categorizes expenses from long receipts, saving significant manual effort. Preparing for early adopter release.
highlights: Designed local‑first data model with sync for resilient offline usage
Implemented AI‑powered OCR pipeline and voice entry
Structured TypeScript‑first codebase across app and services

work.name: TimeCraft
work.summary: Fully functional SaaS for tracking work time and measuring performance. Actively used daily by a group of beta testers, providing insights into time distribution across projects. Supports Ukrainian, Russian, and English. Preparing to integrate payments.
highlights: Built MVP with server components and server actions

work.name: Workineuro
work.summary: Platform helping Ukrainians find employment in the EU, with a custom CMS, static generation, and rebuild automation. Deep Telegram integration: admin panel postings auto‑publish to a channel; applications trigger instant notifications.
highlights: Automated Telegram job announcements from CMS
Reduced admin posting time via workflow automation
Implemented SSR/SSG for fast content delivery

work.name: Boeing
work.summary: Stress engineer working on 737 NG and 737 MAX wing and empennage structures in an international team of ~50 engineers from Poland, India, the United States, and Australia, supporting clients worldwide.
highlights: Trained 2 new engineers in calculation methods and internal tools.
Produced hundreds of detailed repair plans for customers.
Ranked 3rd in the team for number of jobs completed in 2023.
Gained strong presentation, communication, and collaboration skills while delivering high‑quality work under tight deadlines.

education.institution: National Technical University of Ukraine — “Igor Sikorsky Kyiv Polytechnic Institute”
